description:
The Obex BC MIPS Helmet is an essential piece of backcountry safety gear. The NFC medical ID chip makes it easy for rescuers to access vital medical information at the scene of an accident. A multi-directional impact protection system (MIPS) reduces rotational forces and torque of side impacts, making this a super-safe option for your irreplaceable brain.

  • Shell construction is part ABS part polycarbonate for a light and durable helmet
  • EPS liner absorbs and dissipates energy from side impacts and collisions
  • Adjustable vents allow for a perfectly tuned warmth level
  • 360° adjustment system allows for the perfect fit without switching padding
  • MIPS safety system helps reduce rotational forces in the event of a crash
  • twICEme® NFC Medical ID provides crucial info and emergency contacts to rescue teams
  • Built-in Recco® Rescue System reflector allows ski patrol and mountain rescue teams to detect and locate it under snow
  • Removable earpads compatible with Obex Communication Headset (sold separately)
  • Perfect fit with POC goggles (sold separately)
name: POC Obex BC MIPS Helmet - Unisex
